request.description:
### Refreshing Tokens(Refresh Access Token) using following fields :

    [M] - Mandatory Field
    [NM] - Non-Mandatory Field

	refresh_token     : [M] - Refresh token received from login response

### Logout

    Logs out the authenticated user and revokes the current access token.
    
    This endpoint requires authentication token in header.
    
    After successful logout, the token will be revoked and cannot be used for further requests.

### Logout

    Logs out the authenticated user and revokes the current access token.
    
    [M] - Mandatory Field
    [NM] - Non-Mandatory Field
    
    This endpoint requires authentication token in header.
    
    After successful logout, the token will be revoked and cannot be used for further requests.

request.description:
### List Notifications

    Returns a paginated list of notifications for the authenticated user.
    
    Query Parameters:
    - read: [NM] Filter by read status (true/false)
    - per_page: [NM] Number of items per page (default: 15)
    - page: [NM] Page number
    
    Requires authentication token in header.

response.name: Success

request.description:
### List Unread Notifications

    Returns a paginated list of unread notifications for the authenticated user.
    
    Query Parameters:
    - read: [M] Set to false to filter unread notifications
    - per_page: [NM] Number of items per page (default: 15)
    - page: [NM] Page number
    
    Requires authentication token in header.

response.name: Success

request.description:
### List Read Notifications

    Returns a paginated list of read notifications for the authenticated user.
    
    Query Parameters:
    - read: [M] Set to true to filter read notifications
    - per_page: [NM] Number of items per page (default: 15)
    - page: [NM] Page number
    
    Requires authentication token in header.

### List Notifications

    Returns a paginated list of notifications for the authenticated user.
    
    Query Parameters:
    - read: [NM] Filter by read status (true/false)
    - per_page: [NM] Number of items per page (default: 15)
    - page: [NM] Page number
    
    Requires authentication token in header.

response.name: List Notifications

request.description:
### Get Notification Counts

    Returns the counts of read, unread, and total notifications for the authenticated user.
    
    Returns:
    - read_count: Number of read notifications
    - unread_count: Number of unread notifications
    - total_count: Total number of notifications
    
    Requires authentication token in header.

### Get Notification Counts

    Returns the counts of read, unread, and total notifications for the authenticated user.
    
    Returns:
    - read_count: Number of read notifications
    - unread_count: Number of unread notifications
    - total_count: Total number of notifications
    
    Requires authentication token in header.

### Mark Notification as Read

    Marks a specific notification as read for the authenticated user.
    
    URL Parameters:
    - id: [M] Notification UUID
    
    Request Body:
    - read: [NM] Set to true to mark as read (default: true)
    
    Requires authentication token in header.

### Mark Notification as Unread

    Marks a specific notification as unread for the authenticated user.
    
    URL Parameters:
    - id: [M] Notification UUID
    
    Request Body:
    - read: [NM] Set to false to mark as unread
    
    Requires authentication token in header.

### Mark Notification as Read/Unread

    Marks a specific notification as read or unread for the authenticated user.
    
    URL Parameters:
    - id: [M] Notification UUID
    
    Request Body:
    - read: [NM] Set to true to mark as read, false to mark as unread (default: true)
    
    Requires authentication token in header.

### Public Batch Request

    Process multiple API requests in a single call (Maximum 10 requests allowed).
    
    This endpoint does not require authentication and can be used for public endpoints.
    
    Query Parameters:
    - request: [M] Array of request objects
        - url: [M] The API endpoint URL to call
        - request_id: [NM] Optional identifier for the response (if not provided, responses are indexed numerically)
    
    Example:
    ```
    ?request[0][url]=/api/v1/webusers&request[0][request_id]=WebUsers
    &request[1][url]=/api/v1/notifications&request[1][request_id]=Notifications
    ```
    
    Response:
    Returns a combined JSON object with responses indexed by request_id or numeric index.

item.name: Public Batch Request: Invalid request format

response.name: Validation Error

request.description:
### Public Batch Request

    Process multiple API requests in a single call (Maximum 10 requests allowed).
    
    This endpoint does not require authentication and can be used for public endpoints.
    
    Query Parameters:
    - request: [M] Array of request objects
        - url: [M] The API endpoint URL to call
        - request_id: [NM] Optional identifier for the response (if not provided, responses are indexed numerically)
    
    Example:
    ```
    ?request[0][url]=/api/v1/webusers&request[0][request_id]=WebUsers
    &request[1][url]=/api/v1/notifications&request[1][request_id]=Notifications
    ```
    
    Response:
    Returns a combined JSON object with responses indexed by request_id or numeric index.

### Authenticated Batch Request

    Process multiple authenticated API requests in a single call (Maximum 10 requests allowed).
    
    This endpoint requires authentication token and can access protected endpoints.
    The Authorization header is automatically passed to all internal requests.
    
    Query Parameters:
    - request: [M] Array of request objects
        - url: [M] The API endpoint URL to call
        - request_id: [NM] Optional identifier for the response (if not provided, responses are indexed numerically)
    
    Example:
    ```
    ?request[0][url]=/api/v1/profile&request[0][request_id]=Profile
    &request[1][url]=/api/v1/notifications&request[1][request_id]=Notifications
    ```
    
    Requires authentication token in header.

item.name: Authenticated Batch Request: Invalid request format

response.name: Validation Error

request.description:
### Authenticated Batch Request

    Process multiple authenticated API requests in a single call (Maximum 10 requests allowed).
    
    This endpoint requires authentication token and can access protected endpoints.
    The Authorization header is automatically passed to all internal requests.
    
    Query Parameters:
    - request: [M] Array of request objects
        - url: [M] The API endpoint URL to call
        - request_id: [NM] Optional identifier for the response (if not provided, responses are indexed numerically)
    
    Example:
    ```
    ?request[0][url]=/api/v1/profile&request[0][request_id]=Profile
    &request[1][url]=/api/v1/notifications&request[1][request_id]=Notifications
    ```
    
    Requires authentication token in header.

request.description:
### Create/Update Product

[M] - Mandatory Field
[NM] - Non-Mandatory Field

	item_code: [M][191]
	name: [M][191]
	price: [M][10,2]
	description: [M]
	category_id: [M][10]
	sub_category_id: [M]
	available_status: [M][0,1] [enum] ["0","1"]
	quantity: [NM][10]

### Get list without any query parameters

    Returns paginated list of products
    
    Query Parameters:
    - per_page: Number of items per page (default: 15)
    - page: Page number (default: 1)
    - search: Search term (optional)
    - sort_by: Field to sort by (optional)
    - sort_order: Sort order (asc/desc, default: asc)
    - filters: Array of filters (optional)

### Get list with search parameter

    Returns paginated list of products
    
    Query Parameters:
    - per_page: Number of items per page (default: 15)
    - page: Page number (default: 1)
    - search: Search term (optional)
    - sort_by: Field to sort by (optional)
    - sort_order: Sort order (asc/desc, default: asc)
    - filters: Array of filters (optional)

### Get list with filter parameter

    Returns paginated list of products
    
    Query Parameters:
    - per_page: Number of items per page (default: 15)
    - page: Page number (default: 1)
